intro: Psychotria liukiuensis, commonly known as the Ryukyu Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Ryukyu Islands of Japan and is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves with smooth margins. The plant produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. It thrives in shaded, humid environments and is often found in forest undergrowth. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
